Package net.silthus.schat.command

Interface Command

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatCommand, CreatePrivateChannelCommand, JoinChannelCommand, LeaveChannelCommand, SendMessageCommand, SendMessageCommand.Logging, SendPrivateMessageCommand, SetActiveChannelCommand
public interface Command
Represents an operation that can be executed independently and yields a Result.

A list of common commands can be found inside the net.silthus.schat.commands package.

Since:
1.0.0
